page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart linear layer object
page.description: Definition of a linear chart layer.

property.name: colors
property.description: Definition of how each group in the chart data is colored. A value of "default" (the default) will use the colors defined in the palette (see *[link:A5.chart.palettes]*). A function can be used to define the colors dynamically. The function should return the color as a string, or an object with explicit "line" and "fill" colors.

property.name: palette
property.description: Override the palette to use when draw the specific chart layer. See *[link:A5.chart.palettes]*.

property.name: mode
property.description: The shape rendering mode for lines in the SVG. Values can be "auto", "optimizeSpeed", "crispEdges" (the default) or "geometricPrecision".

property.name: value
property.description: The definition of the main axis of the linear chart. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Axis Object]*.

property.name: annotations
property.description: An optional array of annotations to add to the chart. See *[link:A5.chart.guides.annotation]*.

property.name: point
property.description: The settings to control the rendering of data points on the chart. See *[link:A5.chart.guides.linear.point]*.

property.name: group
property.description: The settings to control the rendering of a group of data points on the chart. See *[link:A5.chart.guides.linear.group]*.
